TEXT.TITLE: THE FEDERATED GROUP <FEGP> 4-WEEK SALES DOWN
TEXT.BODY: The Federated Group Inc said its four-week March 1 sales totaled 25.7 mln dlrs, down eight pct from the same period a year ago. The company said sales in the 13 weeks ended March 1 rose 11 pct to 136.6 mln dlrs. In the 52-weeks ended March 1 sales totaled 430.2 mln dlrs, up 18 pct from a year earlier, the company said. Reuter
